verses.verse: The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>; <S%H6557>Pharez<s%>, <S%H2696>Hezron<s%>, and <S%H3756>Carmi<s%>, and <S%H2354>Hur<s%>, and <S%H7732>Shobal<s%>.

And <S%H7211>Reaiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7732>Shobal<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3189>Jahath<s%>; and <S%H3189>Jahath<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H267>Ahumai<s%>, and <S%H3855>Lahad<s%>. These are the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6882>Zorathites<s%>.

And these were of the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H5862>Etam<s%>; <S%H3157>Jezreel<s%>, and <S%H3457>Ishma<s%>, and <S%H3031>Idbash<s%>: and the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H269>sister<s%> was <S%H6753>Hazelelponi<s%>:

And <S%H6439>Penuel<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1446>Gedor<s%>, and <S%H5829>Ezer<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H2364>Hushah<s%>. These are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur<s%>, the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H672>Ephratah<s%>, the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1035>Beth-lehem<s%>.
¶ And <S%H806>Ashur<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H8620>Tekoa<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H802>wives<s%>, <S%H2458>Helah<s%> and <S%H5292>Naarah<s%>.

And <S%H5292>Naarah<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> him <S%H275>Ahuzam<s%>, and <S%H2660>Hepher<s%>, and <S%H8488>Temeni<s%>, and <S%H326>Haahashtari<s%>. These were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5292>Naarah<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2458>Helah<s%> were, <S%H6889>Zereth<s%>, and <S%H6714%H3328>Jezoar<s%>, and <S%H869>Ethnan<s%>.
And <S%H6976>Coz<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H6036>Anub<s%>, and <S%H6637>Zobebah<s%>, and the <S%H4940>families<s%> of <S%H316>Aharhel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2037>Harum<s%>.

¶ And <S%H3258>Jabez<s%> was more <S%H3513>honourable<s%> than his <S%H251>brethren<s%>: and his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H3258>Jabez<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Because I <S%H3205>bare<s%> him with <S%H6090>sorrow<s%>.

And <S%H3258>Jabez<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> on the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Oh <S%H518>that<s%> thou wouldest <S%H1288>bless<s%> me <S%H1288>indeed<s%>, and <S%H7235>enlarge<s%> my <S%H1366>coast<s%>, and that thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> might be with me, and that thou wouldest <S%H6213>keep<s%> me from <S%H7451>evil<s%>, that it may not <S%H6087>grieve<s%> me! And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>granted<s%> him that which he <S%H7592>requested<s%>.
¶ And <S%H3620>Chelub<s%> the <S%H251>brother<s%> of <S%H7746>Shuah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H4243>Mehir<s%>, which was the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H850>Eshton<s%>.

And <S%H850>Eshton<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H1051>Beth-rapha<s%>, and <S%H6454>Paseah<s%>, and <S%H8468>Tehinnah<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H5904>Ir-nahash<s%>. These are the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H7397>Rechah<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7073>Kenaz<s%>; <S%H6274>Othniel<s%>, and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%>: and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6274>Othniel<s%>; <S%H2867>Hathath<s%>.

And <S%H4587>Meonothai<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H6084>Ophrah<s%>: and <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%> <S%H3205>begat<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%>, the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of <S%H2798>Charashim<s%>; for they were <S%H2791>craftsmen<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3612>Caleb<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3312>Jephunneh<s%>; <S%H5900>Iru<s%>, <S%H425>Elah<s%>, and <S%H5277>Naam<s%>: and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H425>Elah<s%>, even <S%H7073>Kenaz<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3094>Jehaleleel<s%>; <S%H2128>Ziph<s%>, and <S%H2129>Ziphah<s%>, <S%H8493>Tiria<s%>, and <S%H840>Asareel<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5834>Ezra<s%> were, <S%H3500>Jether<s%>, and <S%H4778>Mered<s%>, and <S%H6081>Epher<s%>, and <S%H3210>Jalon<s%>: and she <S%H2029>bare<s%> <S%H4813>Miriam<s%>, and <S%H8060>Shammai<s%>, and <S%H3431>Ishbah<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H851>Eshtemoa<s%>.

And his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H3057>Jehudijah<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> <S%H3382>Jered<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1446>Gedor<s%>, and <S%H2268>Heber<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7755>Socho<s%>, and <S%H3354>Jekuthiel<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H2182>Zanoah<s%>. And these are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1332>Bithiah<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, which <S%H4778>Mered<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of his <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H1940>Hodiah<s%> the <S%H269>sister<s%> of <S%H5163>Naham<s%>, the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H7084>Keilah<s%> the <S%H1636>Garmite<s%>, and <S%H851>Eshtemoa<s%> the <S%H4602>Maachathite<s%>.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7889>Shimon<s%> were, <S%H550>Amnon<s%>, and <S%H7441>Rinnah<s%>, <S%H1135>Ben-hanan<s%>, and <S%H8436>Tilon<s%>. And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3469>Ishi<s%> were, <S%H2105>Zoheth<s%>, and <S%H1132>Ben-zoheth<s%>.

¶ The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7956>Shelah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> were, <S%H6147>Er<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H3922>Lecah<s%>, and <S%H3935>Laadah<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H4762>Mareshah<s%>, and the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of them that <S%H5656>wrought<s%> fine <S%H948>linen<s%>, of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H791>Ashbea<s%>,

And <S%H3137>Jokim<s%>, and the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H3578>Chozeba<s%>, and <S%H3101>Joash<s%>, and <S%H8315>Saraph<s%>, who had the <S%H1166>dominion<s%> in <S%H4124>Moab<s%>, and <S%H3433>Jashubi-lehem<s%>. And these are <S%H6267>ancient<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%>.

These were the <S%H3335>potters<s%>, and those that <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> among <S%H5196>plants<s%> and <S%H1448>hedges<s%>: there they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> with the <S%H4428>king<s%> for his <S%H4399>work<s%>.
¶ The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%> were, <S%H5241>Nemuel<s%>, and <S%H3226>Jamin<s%>, <S%H3402>Jarib<s%>, <S%H2226>Zerah<s%>, and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%>:
<S%H7967>Shallum<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H4017>Mibsam<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H4927>Mishma<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4927>Mishma<s%>; <S%H2536>Hamuel<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H2139>Zacchur<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%>.

And <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> had <S%H8337%H6240>sixteen<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%>; but his <S%H251>brethren<s%> had not <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%>, neither did all their <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H7235>multiply<s%>, like to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.
And they <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> at <S%H884>Beer-sheba<s%>, and <S%H4137>Moladah<s%>, and <S%H2705>Hazar-shual<s%>,
And at <S%H1090>Bilhah<s%>, and at <S%H6107>Ezem<s%>, and at <S%H8434>Tolad<s%>,
And at <S%H1328>Bethuel<s%>, and at <S%H2767>Hormah<s%>, and at <S%H6860>Ziklag<s%>,

And at <S%H1024>Beth-marcaboth<s%>, and <S%H2702>Hazar-susim<s%>, and at <S%H1011>Beth-birei<s%>, and at <S%H8189>Shaaraim<s%>. These were their <S%H5892>cities<s%> unto the <S%H4427>reign<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>.
And their <S%H2691>villages<s%> were, <S%H5862>Etam<s%>, and <S%H5871>Ain<s%>, <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%>, and <S%H8507>Tochen<s%>, and <S%H6228>Ashan<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>:

And all their <S%H2691>villages<s%> that were round <S%H5439>about<s%> the same <S%H5892>cities<s%>, unto <S%H1168>Baal<s%>. These were their <S%H4186>habitations<s%>, and their <S%H3187>genealogy<s%>.
And <S%H4877>Meshobab<s%>, and <S%H3230>Jamlech<s%>, and <S%H3144>Joshah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H558>Amaziah<s%>,
And <S%H3100>Joel<s%>, and <S%H3058>Jehu<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3143>Josibiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8304>Seraiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6221>Asiel<s%>,
And <S%H454>Elioenai<s%>, and <S%H3291>Jaakobah<s%>, and <S%H3439>Jeshohaiah<s%>, and <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%>, and <S%H5717>Adiel<s%>, and <S%H3450>Jesimiel<s%>, and <S%H1141>Benaiah<s%>,

And <S%H2124>Ziza<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8230>Shiphi<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H438>Allon<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3042>Jedaiah<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8113>Shimri<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%>;

These <S%H935>mentioned<s%> by their <S%H8034>names<s%> were <S%H5387>princes<s%> in their <S%H4940>families<s%>: and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H6555>increased<s%> <S%H7230>greatly<s%>.

¶ And they <S%H3212>went<s%> to the <S%H3996>entrance<s%> of <S%H1446>Gedor<s%>, even unto the east <S%H4217>side<s%> of the <S%H1516>valley<s%>, to <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> for their <S%H6629>flocks<s%>.

And they <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H8082>fat<s%> <S%H4829>pasture<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%>, and the <S%H776>land<s%> was <S%H7342%H3027>wide<s%>, and <S%H8252>quiet<s%>, and <S%H7961>peaceable<s%>; for they of <S%H2526>Ham<s%> had <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> there of <S%H6440>old<s%>.

And these <S%H3789>written<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H5221>smote<s%> their <S%H168>tents<s%>, and the <S%H4583>habitations<s%> that were <S%H4672>found<s%> there, and <S%H2763>destroyed<s%> them utterly unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in their rooms: because there was <S%H4829>pasture<s%> there for their <S%H6629>flocks<s%>.

And some of them, even of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon<s%>, <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H582>men<s%>, <S%H1980>went<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H8165>Seir<s%>, having for their <S%H7218>captains<s%> <S%H6410>Pelatiah<s%>, and <S%H5294>Neariah<s%>, and <S%H7509>Rephaiah<s%>, and <S%H5816>Uzziel<s%>, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3469>Ishi<s%>.
And they <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H7611>rest<s%> of the <S%H6002>Amalekites<s%> that were <S%H6413>escaped<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> there unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
